mapper.insert: insert into duty(dutyid , dutyname , addtime , memo ) values(#{dutyid} , #{dutyname} , #{addtime} , #{memo} )
mapper.update: update duty set dutyname=#{dutyname} , addtime=#{addtime} , memo=#{memo} where dutyid=#{dutyid}
mapper.select: select a.* from duty a order by dutyid desc
select a.* from duty a where dutyid=#{dutyid} order by dutyid desc

select a.* from duty a where 1=1
and a.dutyname like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{dutyname}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
and a.memo like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{memo}, '%'))
